entry.summary: Re @micarrdc Itâ€™s accurate to say that incentives were an accelerant to EV adoption, but we started Tesla when there were no incentives & gasoline was $2/gallon even in California. Tesla currently has a tax credit *disadvantage*, because the $7500 tax credit stopped applying to us years ago.
